item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, December 7, 2024 at 9:15 PM UTC
item.description:

29. FSharpPacker – compile F# scripts to executables (73 points | 7 comments)
30. The Curse of Recursion: Training on generated data makes models forget (2023) (106 points | 85 comments)
